name: Paul Stamatiou
overview:
Paul Stamatiou is a 25 year old web developer hailing from Houston, Texas. He moved to Atlanta to get his BS in Computational Media from Georgia Tech. After graduation, he stuck around and worked full-time on a startup he co-founded, [Skribit](http://www.crunchbase.com/company/skribit).
Paul interned for [Yahoo!](http://www.crunchbase.com/company/yahoo) in Sunnyvale, California in 2006 and developed the first version of their corporate blog, Yodel Anecdotal.
Paul joined Y Combinator company [Notifo](http://www.crunchbase.com/company/notifo) as co-founder in May 2010. Paul and co-founder Chad Etzel created [Pic A Fight](http://www.crunchbase.com/company/pic-a-fight), a viral site that is Facemash meets Instagram.
Nike featured Paul in his [own online advertisement](http://paulstamatiou.com/2007/12/22/my-nike-ad/) video after finding several of his posts about Nike Plus.
Paul co-founded PicPlum and went through Y Combinator's Summer 2011 batch.
